Strings.Text:
A large herbivorous reptile, a 
Triceratops has crashed into a {pause}{clear}wall and died. It seems that 
someone has shot it with a {pause}{clear}poison bullet, causing its 
nervous system to break down.{pause}
There is a large bite mark.{pause}{clear}It could be the bite mark of a \ndinosaur we've never seen yet.{pause}
Materials for repairs are stacked.\nIt looks like it's been untouched.{pause}{clear}Maybe they thought repairing it \nwas meaningless.{pause}
A steel tower for the electrical \nlines has fallen to the ground. {pause}{clear}Could the Triceratops have done \nthis?{pause}
The hose of the fuel truck is \nconnected to the generator {pause}{clear}underneath all the rubble.{pause}
On the truck are many empty gas \ncylinders.{pause}{clear}The cylinders are marked with \npoison marks.{pause}
You found a new DINO FILE.{pause}
